name: library
description: - login & registration   - book a volume   - return a volume   - show all volumes   - show all available volumes ## Admin account   - login & registration   - add new volume to a database   - delete existing volume from a database   - edit existing volume   - show all volumes   - show all available volumes # Constraints   - user cannot perform admin actions   - admin cannot perform user actions   - user cannot book a volume that has already been booked and is not available
